mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and black on white) announcing the Last Leg of the Anodyne Tour starring the 4th Best Country Band Uncle Tupelo at the Blue Note in Columbia on April 28 and 29 and at Mississippi Nights in St. Louis on April 30 and May 1. Poster features a metal photoplate of Uncle Tupelo and woodcuts of music notes. This poster was repinted in 2006. Posters printed after the original edition are known as "restrikes."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
